page.title: 17Tisbury Shops
page.content: There are{19 shops}in Tisbury. There are 2{cafes}and one of them is also called Tisbury Book Shop. The most popular shop is the {Newsagent.}It sells newspapers, sweets, cigarettes, greetings cards, stationary and a few childrens games. In the summer ice pops can be purchased from the{Fish and Chip shop. {Bib and Tucker}sells clothes, wool and cheap jewellery.{Walloms}is a supermarket and sell everything you would expect a shop of that type to sell. The{butchers}sells mainly meat but also doubles as a supermarket. The {greengrocers}also sells dog leads and dog food. The{chemist}sells medicine, soaps, talc and the like. The electrical shop is called{Underwoods}and they sell, rent or repair all electrical items.
